name: Mortem Noctis
description:
This is a 2.5d retro fps that combines elements from Doom(1996), Call of duty zombies, and Prelude of the chambered.

This is my second finished game and it is a little S CU F F E D, but I think it'll provide enough enjoyment to hold your attention for a while. Thanks so much for stopping by and I really hope that you enjoy the game, and maybe it could even provide you inspiration for your own games!
